text: Sir Eion Sinclair Edgar (30 January 1945 â€“ 14 June 2021) was a New Zealand businessman and philanthropist. He was the chairman of the investment company Forsyth Barr Group for 20 years until his retirement in 2018. He was chancellor of the University of Otago from 1999 and 2003. He was born in Dunedin. Edgar died of pancreatic cancer on 14 June 2021 in Queenstown. He was 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:New Zealand businesspeople Category:People from Dunedin Category:Philanthropists
title: Eion Edgar
